Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory97.png'}
{3: "Rosetta jumps onto the narwhal and gently carries Pfaff back to the boat. Only then did she realize that part of Pfaff's body is beginning to rot."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "How'd this happen! But you didn't get hurt, Grandpa...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pfaff', 3: 'The Punishing... Damnit... And at a time like this...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta has heard of the Punishing Virus from Pfaff not long after setting out to sea. It is a terrible virus that had ravaged the world at the height of the Golden Age.'}
{3: 'The horrific virus had spread everywhere except high altitude areas like the Arctic. Only a special serum can mitigate the effects of the virus.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "So, Grandpa, the thing you said I had to inject everyday... That's the serum?!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta searches Pfaff for a shot of the serum in a panic, but Pfaff gently grabs her hand and shakes his head.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pfaff', 3: "Don't bother looking... I've run out of mine... for quite some time now...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta checks the boat. There is only enough serum left for one person to make the voyage back.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Why...? Why didn't we go back when you knew it's not going to be enough?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: 'I have to kill the narwhal, no matter whatâ€”even if it kills me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But why?! I don't understand...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: "Because Grandpa has sinned. Far more than the Forest Guards... So there's no need to feel any regret.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But Grandpa, you've never done anything bad. How could you be a sinner? They must've made a mistake!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: 'Rosetta, listen to me. Killing the narwhal is our only chance to be allowed into the ARU.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "If that's the case, then I don't wanna join 'em! Weren't we doing okay just living in the forest?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: "For me, it is, but not for you. I can't allow you to be stuck there your whole life. You need friends... You need a future...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Rosetta becomes quiet. She has friends in the port. If she could live a life like an ordinary girl...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Pfaff shoves the high-voltage harpoon into Rosetta's hand. He points it at the narwhal's eye and nods.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pfaff', 3: "Kill the narwhal while you have the chance. Take the core of its electronic brain back to the port manager. He'll know what it is.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta takes the harpoon. She shambles absently toward the narwhal, staring into its eyes.'}
{3: "The narwhal is tranquil as if it has accepted its fate. They both stare silently into each other's eyes."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pfaff', 3: "(Once you kill it, Rosetta, you'll be free...)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: "(You'll no longer have to bear this sin that never was yours. You'll finally get to be a normal girl. You'll get to live without any regrets.)", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1802.jpg'}
{3: 'But Rosetta shakes her head instead. She throws the harpoon into the sea and kneels beside the narwhal.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'If you are the Guardian Spirit of humanity, please listen to my only prayer...'}
{3: 'The young maiden can no longer hold back her tears.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Please, save my grandpa... Please... I beg of you...'}
{3: 'Only with the speed of the narwhal, can the two of them make it back to New Murmansk with the serum they have left.'}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: "Rosetta, give up... It's not a guardian spirit at all. It won't respond to you."}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: "We created it... It's just a cold and heartless machine. It's an irrevocable proof of our sin in a foolish age."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But it chose to protect humanity rather than fight. It's our friend, not a cold-hearted weapon."}
{3: 'The eyes of the narwhal flicker. It lets out a bellowing roar. Toiling visibly, it makes a hard turn and begins dragging their boat to the north.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory212.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pfaff', 3: "Impossible... The narwhal's M.I.N.D. awakened...? Because of Rosetta?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'We can\'t keep calling it the "Guardian Spirit" or just a "narwhal". It should have its own name.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "To become friends, we must know each other's names. Right, Derek?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The narwhal lets out a series of groans as if dissatisfied with the silly name, taken and arranged from Drake Passage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Grandpa, no matter what happened in your past, the three of us have to get back alive. It shouldn't end here!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pfaff', 3: "(Rosetta, you've really grown up... Turns out I was the only one trapped in the sins of the past...)", 4: '1'}
{3: 'And with that, the journey between the two of them and Derek, the narwhal, begins anew.'}
{3: 'But this time, not to a perilous end, but toward their last hope.'}
